channel.title: Michael Murphy - Blog - NixOS
channel.description: Documentation of personal projects covering topics such as data and technology

item.title: Useful References for Understanding Nix/NixOS
item.description:
I recently used Nix to configure my Macbook Air M2, and manage all of my dotfiles. In the process I found a lot of useful references, detailing the ins and outs of Nix and NixOS.

I'm currently building out a similar solution for my homelab, and thought to document a list of useful references here.
